opportunities.title: Presolicitation - Department of Defense Services Contract 1
opportunities.description: This is a presolicitation for professional services required by Department of Defense. The contractor will provide comprehensive support services including but not limited to technical consulting, project management, and system integration services. This opportunity is set aside for Total Small Business businesses.
